name: vistterstudio
description: VistterStudio is a powerful, open-source solution for integrating Wyze cameras with professional streaming and broadcasting software. By leveraging the Wyze Bridge, VistterStudio provides a seamless way to ingest RTSP, RTMP, and HLS streams from your Wyze cameras, enabling you to use them in applications like OBS, VLC, or your own custom streaming solutions.
